Reviews.Title: Solid system, truly portable
Reviews.Author: Katerina "Kat"
Reviews.Content: I've owned my Dell Latitude E6400 for about six months now, and have been working with it almost daily -- running a bunch of web development and graphics editing software.  Have not had any issues with this laptop that would make me regret buying it, overall -- very positive experience.  The performance is solid, I had Win XP Pro on it, and now upgraded to Win 7 Pro, and it runs like a charm!  The battery life is very good (I have a 9-cell battery) -- the longeste I've kept the laptop running non-stop is 4 hours, and never needed to plug back in; the screen size (14") is a good balance for travel and working in comfort. The built-in wireless adapted sometimes needs to be restarted (there is a switch on the side -- turn it on and off to restart the wireless, not a big deal at all), but I only noticed that this needs to be done after the system comes out of hibernation.  I bought this laptop with a deep discount (it was refurbished by Dell), had some reservations at the time of purchase, but am a very happy camper now -- no worries!

Reviews.Title: Finally backlit keyboard
Reviews.Author: Cordless4Ever "Cordless4Ever"
Reviews.Content: This is pretty much configuartion that I got and performance is pretty good with this laptop.Lighted keyaboard had an impact on decission when I decided to buy this laptop and it is really nice and usefull feature that I was looking some time for it.Pros:- Very stable, no reboots and doesn't get frozen even when moving/shaking it- Good metal construction --> no flexing- Good set of connection slots for perrifferrals- Backlit keyboard- Very bright screen but not the best color rendering- e-SATA external connector- Internal Intel wireless 5300 AGN WiFi card is excellentCons:- LCD display is somewhat washed out although very bright- It gets very hot even just browsing internet after relatively brief period. Poor ventilation.- Somewhat heavy for its size- Average battery life (little bit over 3hr of usage when just browsing internet via WiFi with standard battery)- Proprietary HDMI connector (need to buy separate pigtail adapter)I have it almost for a year now and no crashes or some issues or glitches so far.Overall very good business laptop.

Reviews.Title: Simply Splendid
Reviews.Author: anthony
Reviews.Content: Shipped w/i 3 days. 3-4 hour battery life depending on what you have running. Can dual boot operating systems (I have linux and windows 7). Can play low end games like minecraft/FATE/Half Life really well. Runs extremely fast as long as you don't overload it with too many processes.etc. Doesn't come with web cam. Ram, cpu, HDD are all upgradeable!!! Buy it you wont regret it!!!

Reviews.Title: They "shipped" my computer ;)
Reviews.Author: Kyle E. Stancliff
Reviews.Content: Nice product. Very good price for a computer like this. Shows a little wear and tear, but I expected that. The cleaned it up expertly. Works great. And if you need a decent computer that's durable, nothing beats these Dell laptops. Used them every day in the mid-East while deployed, and they stand up well. I got mine for my shop. I'm not sorry at all for buying it.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop.  Excellent customer service.
Reviews.Author: tomkatt
Reviews.Content: I usually don't buy refurbs but decided to take a chance.  The Dell Lattitude E6400 arrived quickly and was in good shape.  After a couple of weeks something went wrong with Windows 7 and it started freezing up.  I emailed the vendor emphasizing that I didn't really think there was anything physically wrong with the laptop, asking if I could get a windows disk to reinstall the operating system.  Almost immediately, I received an email offering to send a whole new hard drive with Win 7 installed.  It arrived very fast and I would recommend both this model and the vendor I bought it from.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude E6400 Laptop
Reviews.Author: Khoda
Reviews.Content: It's a very good laptop, light, clean, reasonable size, and with fast performance. I like it. I was expecting to have Windows XP operating system on it as it was written on Amazon. Fortunately, It has a Windows 7 operating system. Awesome!!

Reviews.Title: It's an OK laptop not meant for gaming
Reviews.Author: julius
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop about 3 years ago and it still works fine I replaced my hard drive for more memory but it's only for people who don't do gaming because it lags a lot. So this laptop was meant for business, school, etc besides gaming. I would say this is a low end laptop not the best ones out there these days but I would say this is really light and portable I bring this every where with me every time my kids and I go to starbucks.

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected
Reviews.Author: Thomas  Morris
Reviews.Content: Just got it a few days ago, but so far so good. It was in great condition for a  refurb, no problems with the hardware or software. All in all I would purchase another one.

Reviews.Title: Good computer for the money.
Reviews.Author: L. Guy
Reviews.Content: Solid performer for the money have own Dell Latitude E6400 in the past and just bought a use one. Only complaints on the heavy side and could have a 15 inch screen.

Reviews.Title: Good Price!
Reviews.Author: Luis Chaves
Reviews.Content: It was in a very good shape! Good condition! The price is excellent. I got what it was described by the store. The only thing I was a little disappointed about, was the charger, the belt that is used to hold the power cord was a little damaged. Other than that the rest was ok and I think it was a good purchase!

Reviews.Title: supper good laptop
Reviews.Author: Dung Tran
Reviews.Content: I'm technician pc I see many laptop using windows Vista running slow . But this laptop running Vista windows are fast . It mean u change into window 7 or 8.it will more increased and fast . I like this seller ..

Reviews.Title: Good deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Augusto Chan-Tay-On
Reviews.Content: Despite it is an old model, its features match the list of requirements for the purpose I got it.The laptop arrived in good working conditions, and the cosmetic is pretty acceptable.

Reviews.Title: "It's unwise to pay too much...but it's worse to pay too little."
Reviews.Author: j.w.
Reviews.Content: When Ezbuycafe says they want you happy. They mean it. Great customer service. Remember what John Ruskinsaid: "It's unwise to pay too much...but it's worse to pay too little. When you pay too much, you lose a littlemoney...that is all. When you pay too little, you sometimes lose everything, because the thing you bought wasincapable of doing the thing it was bought to do." Ezbuycafe is fairly priced. You cannot lose.  I am pleased.

Reviews.Title: RedTag Computers - ACES This one
Reviews.Author: Canadian Gypsy
Reviews.Content: K ... I wanted a cheap'o slug of a laptop to install Solaris on - more on that later - This laptop arrived from Red Tag Computers in record time & the thing was MINT !!! ... didn't even look used. Best part was - it contains a Core2Duo - 2.5ghz - 4gigs of ram & came with a 200gbhd. First order of business was to download & install VirtualBox from Oracle - that went without a hitch - then I installed Solaris 10 in a VM environment - that went without a hitch. I then popped out the 200gbhd & dropped in a Kingston Extreme(which also came from Amazon) & I then attempted to install a clean copy of Solaris - that didn't go so well - not sure why - it's complaining about not being able to contact something on the network - which confuses the heck out of me - cause it installed flawlessly in a VM ... but anyway ... This Dell e6400 is one rocking solid little laptop ... oh ... did I mention it came from Red Tag pre-installed w/Win7_64 Pro (sweet !!!) ... so if anyone is looking for a cheap, solid little laptop ... & your on a tight budget ... I'd HIGHLY recommend picking one up from Red Tag - if your in the market for a solid, cheap, slug of a laptop - you can't go wrong in getting one of these - just remember - these babies came out in 2009 - so don't expect this thing to compare with a i3 or i5 etc - what you get out of the box is a solid little laptop to surf, some SIMPLE word processing etc - don't expect this thing to rock w/gig flop's in speed - it's a SOLID "little" laptop - beat's the other used slugs out there from misc manufactures ... mine even came with the extended battery !!! ... Red Tag really, really, really out did themselves on this deal. As mentioned, I'd highly recommend both this little beast & Red Tag.Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed
Reviews.Author: Ross A Garofalo
Reviews.Content: This laptop is much faster and lighter than what I had before. It's perfect for someone like me who only uses it for web surfing, streaming video, writing word docs, and the occasional spreadsheet.

Reviews.Title: good shape, as described.
Reviews.Author: Paul Braddock "Ruth Braddock"
Reviews.Content: laptop arrived and worked fine, only time will tell with the battery.  Case a little dirty, needed cleaning but was expected since it was used.

Reviews.Title: Great notebook for the price
Reviews.Author: Hatun
Reviews.Content: Update 10/8/13 - I only had this laptop for 3 to 4 months now and I'm beginning to experience a dead lcd screen and the charger is beginning to go out. Don't get confused this is a decent notebook it's just who I purchased it from. Whatever you do don't buy this notebook from Tampa Laptops they shipped me a notebook with no bluetooth module and I had to ask them to give me one since they false advertised. Also there customer service is slow and not very customer friendly.Pros----Backlit keyboard4x usb portsDecent speakersDecent graphics card/Intel GMA 4500MHDAmbient sensor for monitor screenWindows Experience Index score of 3.4Cons----Minor scratchesHeats up pretty quick especially when chargingNo webcam but there is still a mic built inBattery life is a little over 3 hours80gb HDDSo far I'm enjoying my latitude bought from Tampa Laptops. The design is super slick and nice. It has a DVDRW for burning and watching movies. I had to upgrade it from vista 64-bit because it runs extremely buggy and sound is screwed. On windows 7 you can see an amazing difference between vista it runs so much smoother and gives an accurate battery level and time estimates. Drivers where all installed and where easy to upgrade with to windows 7. The charger wasn't the original but is a replacement from Dell so I guess that's good enough. As for storage the hard drive came with 80gb which I can tell you now it isn't enough space for my files so if you get one with 80gb I would recommend upgrading the hard drive ahead of time. Overall this is a great notebook for the price compared to all the other cheap notebooks.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop
Reviews.Author: Eric Conway
Reviews.Content: The Del E6500 laptop arrived promptly.  It was missing the SATA drive, but that was identified up front in the description.  Installed a temp SATA drive to test the motherboard.  The motherboard was good.  In the process of purchasing a new 7200RPM SATA drive to be installed soon.

Reviews.Title: Much more than I expected
Reviews.Author: Olga De La Cruz
Reviews.Content: I order this computer and to my surprise it came over a week early.  It's in perfect condition and works good. It actually turned out to be a lot more than what I expected for the price. I love this computer and will definitely recommend this seller.

Reviews.Title: Laptop
Reviews.Author: Bill Helton
Reviews.Content: Haven't used it much but after setting it up with my docking station and getting 2 screens to work with, the rest of the family are all over it.

Reviews.Title: Rock solid
Reviews.Author: Inspektor Gadget
Reviews.Content: The Dell E6400 is a rock solid laptop and easily as fast as anything you could buy at the store. On an extra positive note, it has the horsepower to run windows 7 quite well and you can also easily upgrade the hard drive to a SSD if desired.

Reviews.Title: Solidly performing
Reviews.Author: Keighlar
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter and she won't be parted from it.  It's missing an "L" on the cover, but other than that it looked good physically with no major scratches.  She's on that laptop for longer than I'd like each day with no issues.  Battery performs well and it was packed quite nicely.

Reviews.Title: great product and a great price!
Reviews.Author: Eugene G. Johnson
Reviews.Content: I give it five stars! It's exactly what I needed and I love the price! I will certainly buy one like this again!

Reviews.Title: Happy camper
Reviews.Author: Geno
Reviews.Content: Received in a timely manner. Had a few extras that I didn't Expect. Everything seems to work fine. No rubber feet don't know what happened to them But that's just a minor thing Overall I think it Was a good value and I'm real happy With purchase.

Reviews.Title: Everything is working..........
Reviews.Author: Darma
Reviews.Content: It is a good laptop, but everything is running, the only complaint is Ubuntu Linux OS instead of Windows, also the laptop like heavily used. The seller is nice give me consolation refund.Recommended for tight budged for laptop.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Cecil.c "Computer Guy"
Reviews.Content: Ok so i bought this laptop when it first came out i bought it for $2000 yes two thousand but it had windows xp installed but the label was for windows vista

Reviews.Title: Dell
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: A second hand laptop computer but it came as preserved as possible, do not complain, the brand is good. excellent

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude E6400 Laptop
Reviews.Author: Evenson Lee
Reviews.Content: Very good computer. it works right out of the box. I love the window 7. it is beautiful. I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Hubby loves it
Reviews.Author: Mekutataki
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for my hubby to deploy with. It's a very nice tough book computer, easy to use, and durable. The CAC card reader was great, no software install just slide in the card and go. Can't wait to see how it fares with updated RAM and through the deployment!

Reviews.Title: I am pleased
Reviews.Author: Max 17
Reviews.Content: Works as I expect it to work, no problems to talk or complain about, and I have been using it since I got it almost everyday, came ready to use right out the box.

Reviews.Title: Terrible, Terrible, Terrible Computer
Reviews.Author: L. W. Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I have owned this computer (the exact one for sale) for about six months now and I use it everyday for class.  IT IS HARD TO IMAGINE A WORSE COMPUTER.  It is the least responsive computer I have ever owned.  It is true that it rarely freezes but it is forever h...hes...hesi...hesitating.  The touch-pad decides when it does and doesn't want to work, which as you can imagine, is extremely frustrating.  Sometimes it will just decide that it wants to turn off, and it does, without warning.  Finally, it cannot understand how to find and maintain an internet connection.  I have an old powerbook (mac) that can find and connect to wireless twice as fast as this brand new laptop, that comes pretty highly rated.  I run Vista business (required at my law school) so maybe that is part of it, but it certainly can't be all of it.  Just thought I should put in my 2 cents since all these ratings are so high, figured I would let people know there is certainly another side.

Reviews.Title: Dell Lattitude
Reviews.Author: rene santiago
Reviews.Content: Buy one used. The computer had signs of heavy usage. I was surprice that the computer turn ON. Lockdown once, and had to install the OP System Again. Since them is working. Performance is low since no have enough RAM and an faster HD. I do not recommend to run demanding Applications. It is heavy to carry over 6 pounds.

Reviews.Title: Worst Laptop Ever
Reviews.Author: John Smith
Reviews.Content: My workplace has 31 of those laptop, as a IT tech there wasn't a single day, I  faced any problem with those laptop.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.53GHz
4GB DDR2 RAM
250GB 7200RPM Hard Drive
14.1-Inch Screen, Quadro NVS 160M
Microsoft Windows XP, Microsoft Windows Vista Business
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Latitude E6400 Laptop
